TopicTitle: New Plane! Faelchra Mk I: Fast Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Efficient Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Agile

Articles.Content:
Hello! So... I have had little inspiration with KSP, but I sat down and decided to try to make a plane. Holy Krap. This has to be one of the best crafts I have ever made. I proudly present...

The Faelchra Mk I:

![eJNcB3I.png](http://i.imgur.com/eJNcB3I.png)

It is an air breathing high altitude plane that uses an inline cockpit. It can take off at speeds of 50 m/s or above, at 5,000 meters it can fly at a constant speed of 300 m/s. When approaching higher altitudes it can fly faster, with 10,000 meters it can fly up to 500 m/s.

![TH2hZHA.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/TH2hZHA.jpg)

![AXrbiIh.png](http://i.imgur.com/AXrbiIh.png)

It has a great reaction with a balance amount of fuel throughout the entire vehicle. Compared to my previous craft, the [Vallum Aero-Wind](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/99665-Vallum-Aero-Wind-%28Low-part-count-fast-and-easy-to-fly!%29) (Shamless Plug) It is just about the same size, but can travel more efficiently, land better, and is centralized around the cockpit, giving more protection to the crew. It has a better turning circle, faster speed, and higher air intake. 

![ZG1a9aw.png](http://i.imgur.com/ZG1a9aw.png)

![hoNtbwE.png](http://i.imgur.com/hoNtbwE.png)

I hope you all like this craft as much as I did, if you have any comments, suggestions, or criticism, PLEASE put it down below! Thank you, and I will see you when I see you! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

[Click here to get the craft!](http://www./download/yua2un7ep4ntt06/Faelchra_Mk_I.craft)

![VcOBchj.png](http://i.imgur.com/VcOBchj.png)
